name: Northern Sharia Law
description:
Short

This is a game that was made in a short deadline and the theme of propaganda to challenge myself and it's definitely not finished. So when you get to the end you shouldn't rate the shit as shit. I'm gonna cry.

It was made completely out of quadragons and circles in seperate GameObjects. It took wayyy too long to make the radio.

Story

The game is a narrative game where you play a journalist visiting the state of Northern Sharia Law (a play on North Korea and ISIS) in the future to write an article about the prosperous and outwardly happy nation.

Controls:

WASD to move around the game and spacebar to inspect items. That's it.
